title: ELDERFLOWER FRENCH 75 COCKTAIL
directions: Add gin, elderflower liqueur and lemon juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Pour into champagne glass. Top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a lemon twist.
ingredients: 1/2 ounce elderflower liqueur, such as St. Germain
2 to 4 ounces prosecco, champagne or other sparkling wine, chilled
